ParameterFields.Name: Disable Spawn Treasure Chest Open Flag
ParameterFields.ToolTip: Will become permanently disabled once a treasure chest sets this open flag.

ParameterFields.Name: Switch to Set
ParameterFields.ToolTip: This switch will be set when the timer starts and unset when the timer ends.

ParameterFields.Name: Timer Duration (Tens of Seconds)
ParameterFields.ToolTip: This number times 10 seconds is how long the timer will last.
